title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
2 points are earned for writing volume with V as integral where 1 point is earned for integral (including constant) and 1 point is earned for limits

2 points are earned for expressing improper integral in terms of a proper integral

1 point is earned for answer from an improper integral

Max 4/5: misses integrity, 2-1-1.

Volume=2π ∫ 0 ∞ x e − x 2 dx                    =2π lim b→∞ ∫ 0 b x e − x 2 dx                    =2π lim b→∞ [ − 1 2 e − x 2 ] 0 b =2π( − 1 2 e − b 2 + 1 2 e 0 )                    =2π( 1 2 ) =π or Volume=π ∫ 0 1 ( (−lny) ) 2  dy=−π lim a→ 0 + ∫ a 1 ( lny )  dy=π

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for the correct A(w)

Maximum:

A(w)=w e − w 2 , A ′ (w)= e − w 2 −2 w 2 e − w 2                = e − w 2 (1−2 w 2 ).

1 point is earned for correctly setting A'(w) = 0

A ′ (w)>0 when w< 1 2 , A ′ (w)=0 when w= 1 2 , A ′ (w)<0 when w> 1 2 .

Therefore, max occurs when w= 1 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaGaam4Daiabg2 da9maalaaabaGaaGymaaqaamaakaaabaGaaGOmaaWcbeaaaaaaaa@399A@

1 point is earned for correctly setting h''(x) = 0

Inflection:

h(x)= e − x 2 , h ′ (x)=−2x e − x 2 , h ″ (x)=−2 e − x 2 −2x(−2x) e − x 2               =2 e − x 2 (−1+2 x 2 ).

h ″ (x)<0 when x< 1 2 , h ″ (x)=0 when x= 1 2 , h ″ (x)>0 when x> 1 2 .

Therefore, inflection point when x= 1 2 .

Therefore, the maximum value of A(w) and the inflection point of h(x) occur when x and w are 1 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaWaaSaaaeaaca aIXaaabaWaaOaaaeaacaaIYaaaleqaaaaaaaa@3798@ .

1 point is earned for correctly indicates that the equation has the same solution
